price: 40. Si deseamos algo, Nos basta con decir: “Sé”, y es.
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
